instructions: Swipe down from the middle of the Home screen. Tap the search field, then enter what you re looking for. Do any of the following: Hide the keyboard and see more results on the screen: Tap Search. Open a suggested app: Tap it. Get more information about a search suggestion: Tap it, then tap one of the results to open it. Start a new search: Tap the Clear Text button in the search field.
Go to Settings > Siri & Search. Scroll down and tap an app. Turn on or off Siri & Suggestions and Allow on Lock Screen.
Go to Settings > Privacy > Location Services. Tap System Services, then turn off Location-Based Suggestions.
In an app, tap the search field or button the Search button (if there is one). If you don t see a search field or button, swipe down from the top. Type your search, then tap Search.

Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 1 1 Open the Facebook app on your iPhone or iPad. The Facebook icon looks like a white "f" in a blue square. If you're not automatically signed in to Facebook, enter your email address or phone number and your password to log in. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 2 2 Tap the field. The Search bar is located on a blue bar at the top of your screen. You can search anything by entering a keyword here. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 3 3 Type Pages into the Search field. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 4 4 Tap the blue button on your keyboard. It's in the lower-right corner of your keyboard. Tapping will bring all the search results on a new page. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 5 5 Tap under the "Pages I like" heading. This heading is listed next to an orange-and-white flag icon in the search results. Tapping this button will open a list of all the pages you like. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 6 6 Tap a page on the list. You can view a page by tapping its name or picture on the list here. Advertisement

Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 7 1 Open the Facebook app on your iPhone or iPad. The Facebook icon looks like a white "f" in a blue square. If you're not automatically signed in to Facebook, enter your email address or phone number and your password to log in. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 8 2 Tap the three horizontal lines icon. This button is located in the lower-right corner of your screen. It will open your navigation menu on a new page. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 9 3 Tap your name at the top of the menu. Your name and profile picture are listed at the top of the navigation menu. Tapping will open your profile. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 10 4 Scroll down and tap . This button is located below your profile picture and information. It will open your profile details. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 11 5 Scroll down and tap . This will open a list of all the pages you like, sorted by category. Here, you will see different categories for pages about movies, tv shows, music, books, sports teams, and many more. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 12 6 Tap . This option is located at the top your Likes page. It will open a list of all the pages you like. Image titled View a List of Your Liked Pages on Facebook on iPhone or iPad Step 13 7 Tap a page. You can view a page by tapping its name or picture here. Advertisement
